main.name: Naufal
main.description: I am an ITB College Student.; I am an IT Enthusiast.; I'm an Amateur Software Engineer.; I'm an Amateur Web Developer.
main.bio: A learner who is full of curiosity and strives to be a better person every day. Having a high interest in Data Science and Web Development, also like to do some riddles and problem-solving questions.

education.description: Majoring in Computer Science, studying that related to information technology
Having specialization on Mathematics and Natural Sciences

experience.title: Ful Stack Web Programmer Intern
experience.description: Creating RESTful Web App with ASP .NET Core and EF Core, which separated into two projects, MVC and API. In MVC App, I'm implementing authentication, localization-globalization, design view with bootstrap, and other features. I'm also implementing OData Protocol, Swagger for documenting API, and middleware modification in the API.

experience.title: Assistant of Distributed System Laboratory
experience.description: Assisting Informatics Student in ITB to do their laboratory work/practice, and also creating the task and grading them.

experience.title: Developer Lead of Anmategra
experience.description: Leading team to create a web application for student affairs in ITB, and also taking part in programming the back-end of the web, such as modelling and creating databases, and creating controller, route, middleware, and documentation of the API.

experience.company: Ministry of Religional Affair (Kementerian Agama), Republik Indonesia
experience.title: Instructor
experience.description: Teaching National Olympian from madrasah (MA) all around Indonesia in my OSN (National Olympiad) Field.

achiviement.title: Top 10 Finalists
achiviement.description: Top 10 in ITB qualification rounds to get ticket to compete abroad, a competition Hult Prize Foundation, in collaboration with the United Nations to design a business plan and solve environmental problems, so we try to solve it with our apps, SociEnvi, platform that give place for collaboration among environmental projects organizer, volunteers, individual funders, and also companies.

achiviement.title: Top 11 Teams
achiviement.description: Top 11 from about 30 teams from different universities, competition in Jeopardy format CTF Competition, which is find vulnerabilities of system to exploit, from ranging from web exploitation, cryptography, until forensics.

achiviement.title: Top 8 Finalists of Competitive Programming
achiviement.description: 5th place in semifinal from about 20 teams from universities all-around Indonesia in Competitive Programming Competition, which focusing on problem solving skills with algorithms, data structures, to obtain time and memory efficiency.

achiviement.event: Olimpiade Sains Nasional (National Olympiad of Indonesia)
achiviement.organizer: Kementerian Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan (Ministry of Education and Culture Republic of Indonesia)
achiviement.title: Gold Medalist
achiviement.description: Biggest annual science competition in Indonesia that held by Ministry of Educational Affair RI, getting 4th place beyond other thousands of participants all around Indonesia.

certification.title: Pelatihan Nasional Tahap III (National Training 3rd Phase)
certification.institution: Kementerian Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan (Ministry of Education and Culture Republic of Indonesia)
certification.description: A training that being held as a preparation for international scale competition, following 3rd phase of the training after being qualified in the 1st and 2nd phase afted selected among thousands of participants
